reporting.reporttable.TableQuery: SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'day'); SET @ToDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EndDateTrim(@ToDate,'day'); SELECT TOP 100 StatisticsObjectName AS '{$reports_referringsites.name_header$}', SUM(HitsCount) AS '{$reports_referringsites.hits_header$}', CAST(CAST(100*CAST(SUM(HitsCount) AS float)/NULLIF(( SELECT SUM(HitsCount) FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN Analytics_DayHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_DayHits.HitsStatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID=@CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode=@CodeName) AND (HitsStartTime >= @FromDate) AND (HitsEndTime <= @ToDate)), 0) AS decimal(5,2)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' AS '{$reports_referringsites.percent_header$}' FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN Analytics_DayHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_DayHits.HitsStatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode=@CodeName) AND (HitsStartTime >= @FromDate) AND (HitsEndTime <= @ToDate) GROUP BY StatisticsObjectName ORDER BY SUM(HitsCount) DESC
